original_text: Wash therefore and anoint yourself, and put on your cloak and go down to the threshing floor, but do not make yourself known to the man until he has finished eating and drinking.
korean_text: 그런즉 너는 목욕하고 기름을 바르고 의복을 입고 타작 마당에 내려가서 그 사람이 먹고 마시기를 다 하기까지는 그에게 보이지 말고

sentences.original_text: and go down to the threshing floor
but do not make yourself known to the man
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 사람에게 자신을 알리지 말라

sentences.original_text: until he has finished eating and drinking
